mapper.insert: insert into band (name, description, isPrivate, topic, masterId) values(#{name}, #{description}, #{isPrivate}, #{topic}, #{masterId});
mapper.select: select * from band where no not in (select bandNo from bandMember where memberId=#{id}) order by no desc;
select * from bandMember join band on bandMember.bandNo = band.no where bandMember.memberId=#{id} and band.masterId not in (#{id}) order by no desc;
select * from band where masterId=#{id} order by no desc
